summary: Union Army deserter, Lt. Hewitt, trains a rag tag band of all-female homesteaders to defend themselves against a Comanche tribe on the warpath.
cast: Audie Murphy|Kathryn Grant|Hope Emerson|Jeff Donnell|Jeanette Nolan|Sean McClory|Ernestine Wade|Peggy Maley|Isobel Elsom|Patricia Tiernan|Kim Charney|Ray Teal|Nestor Paiva|James Griffith|Pamela Baird|Irene Barton|Edwin Chandler|Cecil Combs|Dorothy Crider|John Dierkes|Evelyn Finley|Frank Hagney|Mary Adams Hayes|Charles Horvath|Reed Howes|Chief Geronimo Kuth Le|Sharon Lucas|Francis McDonald|Charles Meredith|Madge Meredith|Ainslie Pryor|Hugh Sanders|Helen Thurston|Willard W. Willingham|Al Wyatt Sr.
title: Brigada de mujeres
